PathConstant Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Constant. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Path Too Long To FitSpecifies how to display a path that is too long to fit in the path constant. LabVIEW applies the value of this property only if the scrollbar of the constant is hidden. Details
Path TypeGets or sets the type of path. Details
Scrollbar Visible?Specifies whether the scroll bar is visible. Details
Shows Abbreviated Behavior?Returns whether the path constant is currently abbreviating the path. This property returns FALSE if the object is set to clip the path, if the scrollbar is visible, or if the path fits in the path object. Details
Size To Text?Sets whether the size of the path constant changes according to the text included. Details
